name: Zombies (Noah)
description:
Just a hobby project and somewhere to post to help me stay motivated, messing around with remaking CoD WaW Zombies. I was going for a ps1 style maybe but could change. Everything looks and feels really janky as i'm still developing this. I'll try to upload a new version every week or less, just depends on what/how much I get done, or if I just feel like it.

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

R - Reload

Left Shift - Run

Left Mouse/ Right Mouse - Shoot / Aim

Scroll Up/Down - Weapon Change
